articles.title: Latest on COVID-19 in MN: Vaccinations reach new record high - Minnesota Public Radio News
articles.description: Minnesota set a new record for COVID-19 vaccinations Sunday, with nearly 70,000 new doses reported. That beats the old record, set the day before, of around 56,000 doses.
articles.content:
3 things to know:
  • Record single-day increase in vaccinations
  • Walz: Shots for all Minnesotans by summer
  • Officials: Kids, families should now get tested every 2 weeks
